song_name: The Love That Lasts The Longest Part 1
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Love That Lasts The Longest Part 1 is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
